p: Contigs were annotated by the use of the RAST (Rapid Annotation using Subsystem Technology) server ( 73) and the online tool ORF Finder ( http://www.bioinformatics.org/sms2/orf_find.html). Conserved domains within the predicted encoded proteins were identified using CD-search against the Conserved Domain Database (CDD) at NCBI. Sequence logos were drawn using the ggseqlogo package in R ( 74).
